survey_response.review_text: I just love this doctor. She is so dedicated and has great patience. Though it was the last appointment for me, she had the same interest and patience to understand and provide the right solution. 11 years back she delivered my baby and i cannot forget that. She takes care of me like a kid. So adorable person. Ma'am, you need an assistant to type and change bed sheets each time, don't take so much stress by doing everything by yourself. Hats off to your efforts. She had started her day from morning 5.30 am and still so dedicated at her work till evening 7.30 pm. She is an amazing lady with great experience. We need such doctors in life where we can trust for years together.

This is a long overdue review of Dr. Vijaya Sherbet. She delivered my son in the month of feb 2020.
The first time i had met her was when i consulted her for my pregnancy in 2019 which unfortunately resulted in a miscarriage. But she was so positive and practical through that experience that i knew that if i was to get pregnant again she would be my doctor. A year later when i was pregnant i went back to her and i am so happy i did. She is someone i would recommend a hundred percent to any pregnant mom. *** ** ****** ************* *** *** ********* ** **** **** *** keeping up information and standards across the world. She is not someone who will mollycoddle you but at the same time she is so patient and non judgemental. She will answer all your questions with a lot of patience and practicality. Even through my delivery when things got tough i felt safe and calm because of her. She is someone i would close my eyes and go back to every single time.
I hope Dr Sherbet gets to read this because we are thankful for the entire pregnancy and delivery experience we went through because of her. 
Thank you! Regards Smita & Rahul

This is the feedback of "Dr Vijaya Sherbet" and not "Columbia asia hospital Hebbal" in general. She is a senior doctor in Columbia Asia Hebbal branch. I would provide here the honest feedback of this doctor. This is to help others who will face the same circumstances when dealing with her.

We had heard good feedback for her and hence decide to pursue with her. *** ** * ********** **** ****** **** **** ********* ***** ******* ******* *** ************** She will greet you with smile, explain you the tests that needs to be done and medicines to be taken. You will also have very basic questions to ask.

However, when the complication arise in the pregnancy then it's hard to get any good explanation of a question. It is also very hard to predict if your pregnancy will develop a complication. Complication can arise anytime. I would STRONGLY SUGGEST you to switch doctor if there is any complication. PLEASE DON'T TAKE ANY CHANCES AND LEARN FROM MY EXPERIENCE.

These are the problems you will face with her in complicated pregnancy
1. A complicated pregnancy comes with lot of trauma on parents. They generally have multiple questions. It's very hard to not ask your friends (or google) and clarify with your doctor. Doctor Vijaya doesn't entertain additional questions. She will behave rigidly and would expect you to move along without any queries. In our case, even one query got her irritated. The experience turn sour so quickly that we were not sure what to ask her.

1. She takes thing to heart. ** *** *** ** ***** *********** *** **** *** ********** **** ****** ********* *** *** **** Cross questioning could be simply asking these type of questions: Why are you saying 'something ......', my friend had the same problem but could continue for longer duration before surgery. She doesn't like to be cross questioned or probed for clarification. From this point onwards, her behavior will become rigid towards you.

1. I have never once saw her trying to console us ** ****** ******* When you are dealing with complicated pregnancy, few consoling words from your doctor can work magic on you. ** * ******* *** ********* ** * ****** ****** ** ******* ******* ** **** ******** ****** *** *****She will never say words like these: "don't worry, you try to do what I am saying and lets pray and hope for the best". She has become so rigid internally that no amount of worry, even tears in the patient eyes moves her.

*** *** ******* ** ** ** ***** *** **************************** ** *** **** ** ******* ******** I can provide you with more pin pointed feedback.

I visited the doctor for an infection. She initially just asked my symptoms and told for tests ******* **** ********* When I further explained my condition then she checked.
She Diagnosed correctly but when I asked for what us was actually she asked me to Google it. 
I just expected her to tell me what the condition was, how it can be treated and how long would it take to heal. None of this was explained. She wrote the pills and we left. 
As a doctor she needs to be empathetic and ensure patients don’t panic and feel safe.

Hi, i am Parvin taj , consulted dr.vijaya for my delivery. I delivered baby boy safely on Dec 2nd 2019. I am extremely happy with dr Vijay and the way she takes care of her patients is commendable.
If you are looking for best gynecologist at North side of Bangalore then Dr Vijaya is the BEST. she is flexible, friendly, approachable and genuine doctor.she knows what patient expect from doctor and she listen to the problem and provide best solution to it. She never makes u panic and she stands for you till baby delivered. I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes and other doctors scared me due to high sugar level. But when i consulted dr Vijaya she gave me confidence that my baby is safe and sugar levels can be controlled easily. She was always available on phone and make sure i get right advise at right Time. I got motherly feeling whenever i consulted her. I am blessed to get my baby delivered by dr.vijaya. i will bet you others will also feel the same. Just thought of sharing my experience so that other will come to know how good dr Vijaya is and this makes expecting mother to land in safe hands to deliver their baby. Lots of Love Dr Vijaya. 

Thanks
Parvin

Hi, Am Haseena Banu I was suffering from heavy bleeding ,fibroid and Cist. I met Dr Vijaya Sherbet on 29th June 2021 it was first appointment with her but she took care as if am old patient of hers. she took personal care for my all test and she was friendly and understood my condition and didn't panic me, she made me cool and suggested to take one week tablet and next week when we visited she suggested for laproscopy with Dr. Shifalika. After three days I got admitted and got laproscopy done 
on 9th July 2021 and within two days I was discharged. Thank you Doctor, from past ten years I was suffering and you have relieved me from my problem.

I had a fantastic experience delivering my baby girl with Dr. Vijaya. She has been extremely supportive of my choices throughout my pregnancy and wherever any medication or medical procedure was required she patiently explained all the steps, pros and cons to me and answered all the numerous doubts I had. She did not push me to make any decisions and I felt in control through out my pregnancy and delivery. Even during my labour she never pushed me to take an Epidural or suggested any other procedures when I refused to take any pain relief measures until I was sure I really needed them. The nursing staff at Columbia Asia Hebbal were also super kind and patient and really supported me through my entire labour and delivery. Thank you so much Doc and the entire team at Columbia Asia.

Columbia Asia ***** *** ** *** **** ********* lack a lot of hospitality , the staffs at the reception have a very bad attitude they do no know the no of patients waiting or have the information about the doctor. finally after waiting for more than an hour the doctor was in a great hurry *** *** *** ******* ***** She was not bothered to take the details from the patient instead kept writing the tests and scans to be taken and walked away. extremely disappointed with the service and would never recommend her.

My wife had lots of bleeding during her 3rd month of pregnancy so we visited Dr. Vijaya. First she took us for radiology test and we could see baby movements. For the sake of assurance my wife asked about heart beat of child and immediately the doctor very rudely asked have you been to school before. can you not see the movements.Next we went to her cabin and I asked her the possible reasons for the bleeding but she dint give any clear explanation. I then asked her if this can be a cause for concern and if it's related to periods but she rudely asked me have you studied science before. I mentioned to her that I am a bio student so she can explain..After taking 800 for consultation I believe it's her duty to answer the queries with patience rather than asking if we are educated. ** * *** ****** *** ********* *** ****** * *** ** **** ** ******* *****we visited her twice both times the experience was bad. I wouldn't recommend.

Very good doctor. She listens to your problem and probes as well for further clarification on analyzing. Explains in depth what is the nature of problem if any. And doesn't recommend any unnecessary tabs or any test. Though, this was my first visit. Was satisfied. She is knowledgeable in her field. And experienced as well. 

She is not biased with in terms of rich or poor. She is not rude unlike other doctors. Or doesn't try to wrap up your consultation keeping the long queues in the clinic.

Only problem is she comes very late. May be she can try coming early.

thanks!

I just love this doctor. She is so dedicated and has great patience. Though it was the last appointment for me, she had the same interest and patience to understand and provide the right solution. 11 years back she delivered my baby and i cannot forget that. She takes care of me like a kid. So adorable person. Ma'am, you need an assistant to type and change bed sheets each time, don't take so much stress by doing everything by yourself. Hats off to your efforts. She had started her day from morning 5.30 am and still so dedicated at her work till evening 7.30 pm. She is an amazing lady with great experience. We need such doctors in life where we can trust for years together.

The first time i had met her was when i consulted her for my pregnancy in 2019 which unfortunately resulted in a miscarriage. But she was so positive and practical through that experience that i knew that if i was to get pregnant again she would be my doctor. A year later when i was pregnant i went back to her and i am so happy i did. She is someone i would recommend a hundred percent to any pregnant mom. *** ** ****** ************* *** *** ********* ** **** **** *** keeping up information and standards across the world. She is not someone who will mollycoddle you but at the same time she is so patient and non judgemental. She will answer all your questions with a lot of patience and practicality. Even through my delivery when things got tough i felt safe and calm because of her. She is someone i would close my eyes and go back to every single time.
I hope Dr Sherbet gets to read this because we are thankful for the entire pregnancy and delivery experience we went through because of her. 
Thank you! Regards Smita & Rahul

And doesn't recommend any unnecessary tabs or any test. Though, this was my first visit. Was satisfied. She is knowledgeable in her field. And experienced as well. 

She is not biased with in terms of rich or poor. She is not rude unlike other doctors. Or doesn't try to wrap up your consultation keeping the long queues in the clinic.

Only problem is she comes very late. May be she can try coming early.

thanks!

Dr Vijaya was extremely cordial and listened to me carefully. Gave clear and detailed information in simple language which was very helpful. She did not recommend any extensive tests or prescribe strong medication as I did not require any. The only tests she suggested were of a routine nature which based on her physical examination she suggested. 
I would strongly recommend her to any woman. She additionally discussed health with my teenage daughter and gave her scientific and useful guidance.

I would strongly recommend Dr Vijaya Sherbet, as she is efficient, non- nonsense sort of a Doctor, she not only answered questions about my unborn child but also patiently discussed about some doubts I had about my 7 year daughter!
Not many would give such time in times busy schedules.

Absolutely not happy, Doc was busy n kept us wait for more than 15 mins . she was on call for which it was not a medical case/discussion. Did not even listen to the patients problem just concluded saying if its a gynic issue " am sorry u will be charged else meet urologist"  not sure how she could judge the issue in 1st place.
it was a waste of time in waiting for an hour to consult this doctor, I don't recommend her at all.

Bad experience.. Doctor was In a hurry to see more patients and she cleared 6 patient before us in 10 mins .. She wanted us also to clear off asap and as soon as we started to share the problem she wrote some medicines and when we asked further , she got agitated and was rude .. She wrote lots of tests and harmonal medicines despite my wife still feeding my daughter and the medicines would have stopped the milk flow.. I will not want to visit her again or would recommend anyone..
She is such a good person who is very much dedicated towards her work... **** ************ ******* Totally satisfied
She is very nice Doctor. She is giving nice treatment for pregnancy. I have visited 4-5 times she is very kind and friendly to us.
She is very knowledgeable, she nicely tracks  medicines/tests required during pregnancy. Our overall experience is very good.

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Your kind words and appreciation mean a lot to us at Manipal Hospital - Hebbal, and we'll be sure to convey your message to Dr. Vijaya Sherbet. We wish you the best of health in the future!

survey_response.review_text:
Long story short - twin normal delivery

She is an asset to the organization. She will do best to her ability. We are visiting her from 1st month of pregnancy  and each visit she will do scan apart from the milestone scan.  No extra medicine  no fancy things. If patient show 5% interest for normal delivery she will take care of remaining 95%. Highly recommended for normal delivery.

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Your kind words and appreciation mean a lot to us at Manipal Hospital - Hebbal, and we'll be sure to convey your message to Dr. Vijaya Sherbet. We wish you the best of health in the future!

survey_response.review_text: Dr. Vijaya is a wonderful Doctor.  I visited her for my fibroid and uterine bleeding problem. She patiently took time and guided me through the  Uterine Artery Embolization process along with Dr. Rajesh. The procedure was a success and very helpful. I am now released permanently out of this problem through Dr. Vijaya which I was suffering for the past five -six years.  She took personal care in every step. God Bless her always. She is quite friendly. Thank you Dr. for all your time and effort.

************** ********. Gave a confirmed appointment at 1700. Made us wait till 1730 before informing the nurse that she was busy in a 'procedure', and will try to come earliest at 1800.

Not acceptable. ** *** *** ******* ** **** **** **** ** * ******* ********

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Your kind words and appreciation mean a lot to us at Manipal Hospital - Hebbal, and we'll be sure to convey your message to Dr. Vijaya Sherbet. We wish you the best of health in the future!

survey_response.review_text: I met doctor first time in year Jan 2000 for D &C . I liked the dr very much . She treated me like a younger sister so very much comfortable .After 2 yrs I came Bangalore specially for delivery at my Mom in law place and contact ed dr at the 8 th month .She made me always calm and explained everything . That time she was associated in Satya Hospital , Kammanhalli . We all were so happy . Great Gratitude for her . and recommend to all . Thank you and love you ma'am .
******* ******* Good mentor. Very clear. No extra scans, tests, medicines etc. Very positive approach.
Very good, doctor explained in detail on do's & don'ts post delivery. and her advice is very very useful.
Very good, she was very friendly and helpful. Explained in detail for our queries. I will recommend Dr. Vijaya to others.

I went for my pregnancy. it took around 15 hrs for my delivery but she did not loose her patience keep on on tell me to try from my self.  finally at last  with her help I was able to deliver a healthy baby normally. Thank you doctor.
Experience was good. Doctor explained to me in detail regarding my issue.
really good doc.She gives a lot of time and answer to each question.
Doctor is really good. She explained us all medical related things very beautifully. And most importantly she has time to answer our doubts.
My experience with Dr.Vijaya was,nice.she was friendly and spoke to me very nicely.After meeting Dr,i'm tension free.
We consulted the doctor. It was good experience. Doctor heard the problem carefully and prescribed good medicine
